message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this truly unique product.  Given its incredible value and potential, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,400,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a competitive price. While your offer is appreciated, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I can go down to $1,350,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product.
Bob, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,300,000. However, I need you to understand this is my absolute bottom line.  It reflects the true worth of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product.

Bob, I've been flexible throughout these negotiations, but I need you to understand the value of what you're getting. My final offer stands at $1,300,000. If we can't agree on this, I'm afraid I'll have to explore other options.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to pay $1,300,000. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000 for the product.
